thread.title: Watch Johnny Manziel coaching quarterbacks at The Opening Miami
thread.title_full: Watch Johnny Manziel coaching quarterbacks at The Opening Miami

title: Watch Johnny Manziel coaching quarterbacks at The Opening Miami
text:
Watch Johnny Manziel coaching quarterbacks at The Opening Miami This probably isn't how you pictured a typical Johnny Manziel Sunday morning. Slot to 247Sports Links 
You probably thought Johnny Manziel spent his Sunday mornings double-fisting Pedialyte. But on this particular Sunday morning, he was in Miami, imparting wisdom to the next generation of college football stars. The former Heisman Trophy winner was coaching quarterbacks at The Opening Miami. On Saturday, he was photographed hanging out on a yacht, sipping a pink beverage that it's not unreasonable to assume had alcohol in it . What a life. 
In January, Manziel indicated to ESPN his desire to return to the NFL. 
"Only need one team to believe in me, " Manziel said , "and I'll do anything to make that a possibility." Manziel claimed to have achieved sobriety without professional assistance. Ranking the 25 fastest players in NFL Combine history Start SlideShow 
Manziel last played in the NFL in 2015. He was suspended for the first games of the 2016 season but, after being cut by the Browns, never found a team willing to sign him. Manziel was dropped by multiple agents in 2016 after failing to come through on promises to get his act together. In April, he was charged by a Dallas grand jury with misdemeanor assaulting of his girlfriend, but eventually reached a plea agreement with the district attorney. Author
